synopsis: Encountered double betrayal, she came through hatred.He is weak and depends on the imperial physician to survive.In front of people, he was a short-lived prince, but he was born to be intelligent and unforgettable; After the person, he was resourceful, strategizing, and graceful.The slag male and female are going through, and in this world she needs to find a backing. He is her "opportunity".However, the fate is destined to be his love, this is the curse that spans the millennium, and it will last forever.
